paper_abstract: We consider the following NP-hard problem: given a connected graph G = (V, epsilon) and a link set E on V disjoint to epsilon, find a minimum size subset of edges F subset of E such that (V, epsilon boolean OR F) is 2-edge-connected. In G. Even et al. (2005) [2] we presented a 1.8-approximation for the problem. In this paper we improve the ratio to 1.5. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A 1.5-approximation algorithm for augmenting edge-connectivity of a graph from 1 to 2
